meanings.definition: A former Russian local government council.
meanings.sent1: The zemstva played a crucial role in governing local areas in Russia.
meanings.sent2: The zemstva were responsible for managing public services in rural communities.
meanings.sent3: The zemstva members had lively debates during their council meetings.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the zemstva extended far beyond their administrative duties.
meanings.sent5: The historical significance of the zemstva cannot be overstated.

meanings.sent1: Many zemstva existed across different regions of Russia.
meanings.sent2: The zemstva were instrumental in shaping local policies.
meanings.sent3: During the event, attendees discussed various zemstva.
meanings.sent4: The impact of these zemstva reverberated throughout the country.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of opinions within the zemstva led to productive discussions.
